Demo of CO2 reduction

DEMO
Step 1, Calculator.The user can enter the details of his flight. The carbon footprint will be automatically calculated.

DEMO
Step 2, Pick CO2 offsets. The user can choose offsets and project for reducing his carbon footprint. DAO IPCI platform based on Blockchain technology, so you can choose various options for the repayment of international programs and types of projects.
CO2

1Calculator2Pick CO2 offsets3Certificate4Payment (14,46 $)

Calculation with your data will be available in the near future. Please stay tuned.
DEMO
Step 3, Certificate. The user can generate a certificate for personal use or for the company report.
CO2
2,89
1Calculator2Pick CO2 offsets3Certificate4Payment (14,46 $)

Certificate for 2,89 Tons CO2

You are going to compensate your carbon footprint buying the "Integrated Program for Climate Initiatives" for the project "Reducing emissions from the burning of fossil fuels" 4.03.2017

For you will be generated certificate with a unique transaction number for identifying your carbon footprint reducing.

Calculation with your data will be available in the near future. Please stay tuned.
DEMO
Step 4, Payment. After the payment user will receive an electronic certificate with a unique transaction number for verification.
